message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, no need to overthink it!
Take it or leave it, I'm not going for a 50/50 split!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much!
You're not giving me enough, I'm trying to get a better deal here!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving away too much more!
You're not budging, so I'll try to take a bigger share!

You're getting desperate, so I'm taking a bigger share now!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!

You're out of options, so I'm taking almost all of it!
